original_text: When the soldiers did that, it happened just like the prophets had written about him long ago. After that, some of Jesus' disciples took him down from the cross where he had died. They took his body and they buried it.
korean_text: 성경에 그를 가리켜 기록한 말씀을 다 응하게 한 것이라 후에 나무에서 내려다가 무덤에 두었으나

sentences.original_text: it happened just like the prophets had written about him
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 예언자들이 그에 대해 쓴 것과 정확히 같이 일어났습니다

sentences.original_text: some of Jesus' disciples took him down
sentences.korean_translation: 예수의 제자 몇 명이 그를 내려왔습니다

sentences.original_text: from the cross where he had died
